name: Abomination
oracle_text: Whenever Abomination blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

name: Acid Rain
oracle_text: Destroy all Forests.

name: Active Volcano
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target blue permanent.
• Return target Island to its owner's hand.

name: Adun Oakenshield
oracle_text: {B}{R}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: ". . . And at his passing, the bodies of the world's great warriors shall rise from their graves and follow him to battle." —The Anvilonian Grimoire

name: Adventurers' Guildhouse
oracle_text: Green legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures." (Any legendary creatures can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other legendary creatures." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two legendary creatures you control, one of which has "bands with other legendary creatures," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Ærathi Berserker
oracle_text: Rampage 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor_text: Ærathi children who show promise are left to survive for a year in the wilderness. Those who return are shown the way of the Berserker

name: Aisling Leprechaun
oracle_text: Whenever Aisling Leprechaun blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature becomes green. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Akron Legionnaire
oracle_text: Except for creatures named Akron Legionnaire and artifact creatures, creatures you control can't attack.

name: Al-abara's Carpet
oracle_text: {5}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures without flying.
flavor_text: Al-abara simply laughed and lifted one finger, and the carpet carried her high out of our reach.

name: Alabaster Potion
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target player gains X life.
• Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: "Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity." —D'Avenant proverb

name: Alchor's Tomb
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target permanent you control becomes the color of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: All Hallow's Eve
oracle_text: Exile All Hallow's Eve with two scream counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if All Hallow's Eve is exiled with a scream counter on it, remove a scream counter from it. If there are no more scream counters on it, put it into your graveyard and each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Amrou Kithkin
oracle_text: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
flavor_text: Quick and agile, Amrou Kithkin can usually escape from even the most fearsome opponents.

name: Angelic Voices
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control no nonartifact, nonwhite creatures.

name: Angus Mackenzie
oracle_text: {G}{W}{U}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Activate this ability only before the combat damage step.
flavor_text: "Battles no longer served a purpose in Karakas." —Angus Mackenzie, Diary

name: Anti-Magic Aura
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells and can't be enchanted by other Auras.

name: Arboria
oracle_text: Creatures can't attack a player unless that player cast a spell or put a nontoken permanent onto the battlefield during their last turn.

name: Arcades Sabboth
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Arcades Sabboth unless you pay {G}{W}{U}.
Each untapped creature you control gets +0/+2 as long as it's not attacking.
{W}: Arcades Sabboth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

name: Arena of the Ancients
oracle_text: Legendary creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
When Arena of the Ancients enters the battlefield, tap all legendary creatures.

name: Avoid Fate
oracle_text: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.

name: Axelrod Gunnarson
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Axelrod Gunnarson this turn dies, you gain 1 life and Axelrod deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

name: Ayesha Tanaka
oracle_text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
{T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source unless that ability's controller pays {W}. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

name: Azure Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: The Azure Drake would be more powerful were it not so easily distracted.

name: Backdraft
oracle_text: Choose a player who cast one or more sorcery spells this turn. Backdraft deals damage to that player equal to half the damage dealt by one of those sorcery spells this turn, rounded down.

name: Backfire
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to you, Backfire deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

name: Barbary Apes
flavor_text: Unpredictable in the extreme, these carnivorous apes will prey even upon their own kind.

name: Barktooth Warbeard
flavor_text: He is devious and cunning, in both appearance and deed. Beware the Warbeard, for this brute bites as well as he barks!

name: Bartel Runeaxe
oracle_text: Vigilance
Bartel Runeaxe can't be the target of Aura spells.
flavor_text: Thundering down from Hammerheim, no foe could slow Bartel's charge.

name: Beasts of Bogardan
oracle_text: Protection from red
Beasts of Bogardan gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a nontoken white permanent.
flavor_text: Bogardan is a land as volatile as the creatures who live there.

name: Black Mana Battery
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Black Mana Battery.
{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Black Mana Battery: Add {B}, then add an additional {B} for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Blazing Effigy
oracle_text: When Blazing Effigy dies, it deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the amount of damage dealt to Blazing Effigy this turn by other sources named Blazing Effigy.

name: Blight
oracle_text: Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

name: Blood Lust
oracle_text: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.

name: Blue Mana Battery
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Blue Mana Battery.
{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Blue Mana Battery: Add {U}, then add an additional {U} for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "O! call back yesterday, bid time return." —William Shakespeare, King Richard the Second

name: Boris Devilboon
oracle_text: {2}{B}{R}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black and red Demon creature token named Minor Demon.

name: Brine Hag
oracle_text: When Brine Hag dies, change the base power and toughness of all creatures that dealt damage to it this turn to 0/2. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Bronze Horse
oracle_text: Trample
As long as you control another creature, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Bronze Horse by spells that target it.

name: Carrion Ants
oracle_text: {1}: Carrion Ants gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "‘War is no picnic,' my father liked to say. But the Ants seemed to disagree." —General Chanek Valteroth

name: Cat Warriors
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: These stealthy felines have survived so many battles that some believe they must possess many lives.

name: Cathedral of Serra
oracle_text: White legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures." (Any legendary creatures can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other legendary creatures." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two legendary creatures you control, one of which has "bands with other legendary creatures," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Caverns of Despair
oracle_text: No more than two creatures can attack each combat.
No more than two creatures can block each combat.

name: Chain Lightning
oracle_text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

name: Chains of Mephistopheles
oracle_text: If a player would draw a card except the first one they draw in their draw step each turn, that player discards a card instead. If the player discards a card this way, they draw a card. If the player doesn't discard a card this way, they put the top card of their library into their graveyard.

name: Chromium
oracle_text: Flying
Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Chromium unless you pay {W}{U}{B}.

name: Cleanse
oracle_text: Destroy all black creatures.
flavor_text: The clouds broke and the sun's rays burst forth; each foul beast in its turn faltered, and was gone.

name: Clergy of the Holy Nimbus
oracle_text: If Clergy of the Holy Nimbus would be destroyed, regenerate it.
{1}: Clergy of the Holy Nimbus can't be regenerated this turn. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

name: Cocoon
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
When Cocoon enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and put three pupa counters on Cocoon.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during your untap step if Cocoon has a pupa counter on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a pupa counter from Cocoon. If you can't, sacrifice it, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature, and that creature gains flying.

name: Concordant Crossroads
oracle_text: All creatures have haste.

name: Cosmic Horror
oracle_text: First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy Cosmic Horror unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}. If Cosmic Horror is destroyed this way, it deals 7 damage to you.
flavor_text:
"Then flashed the living lightning from her eyes,/ And screams of horror rend th' affrighted skies."
—Alexander Pope, The Rape of the Lock

name: Craw Giant
oracle_text: Trample
Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor_text: Harthag gave a jolly laugh as he surveyed the army before him. "Ho ho ho! Midgets! You think you can stand in my way?"

name: Crevasse
oracle_text: Creatures with mountainwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have mountainwalk.

name: Crimson Kobolds
flavor_text:
"Kobolds are harmless."
—Bearand the Bold, epitaph

name: Crimson Manticore
oracle_text: Flying
{R}, {T}: Crimson Manticore deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Noted neither for their good looks nor their charm, Crimson Manticores can be fearsome allies. As dinner companions, however, they are best left alone.

name: Crookshank Kobolds
flavor_text: The Crookshank military boasts a standing army of nearly twenty-four million, give or take twenty-two million.

name: Cyclopean Mummy
oracle_text: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.
flavor_text: The ritual of plucking out an eye to gain future sight is but a curse that enables the living to see their own deaths.

name: Dakkon Blackblade
oracle_text: Dakkon Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor_text: "My power is as vast as the plains, my strength is that of mountains. Each wave that crashes upon the shore thunders like blood in my veins." —Memoirs

name: Darkness
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: "If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride,/ And hug it in my arms." —William Shakespeare, Measure for Measure

name: D'Avenant Archer
oracle_text: {T}: D'Avenant Archer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Deadfall
oracle_text: Creatures with forestwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have forestwalk.

name: Demonic Torment
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Devouring Deep
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: "Full fathom five thy father lies;/ Of his bones are coral made;/ Those are pearls that were his eyes;/ Nothing of him that doth fade,/ But doth suffer a sea-change/ Into something rich and strange." —William Shakespeare, The Tempest

name: Disharmony
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
Untap target attacking creature and remove it from combat. Gain control of that creature until end of turn.

name: Divine Intervention
oracle_text: Divine Intervention enters the battlefield with two intervention counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an intervention counter from Divine Intervention.
When you remove the last intervention counter from Divine Intervention, the game is a draw.

name: Divine Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor_text: D'Haren stared at the twisted lump of metal that had been a prized artifact. The fight was getting ugly.

name: Divine Transformation
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
flavor_text: Glory surged through her and radiance surrounded her. All things were possible with the blessing of the Divine.

name: Dream Coat
oracle_text: Enchant creature
{0}: Enchanted creature becomes the color or colors of your choice. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text: "Adopt the character of the twisting octopus, which takes on the appearance of the nearby rock. Now follow in this direction, now turn a different hue." —Theognis, Elegies 1, 215

name: Durkwood Boars
flavor_text: "And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine; and the herd ran violently . . ." —Mark 5:13

name: Dwarven Song
oracle_text: Any number of target creatures become red until end of turn.

name: Elder Land Wurm
oracle_text: Defender, trample
When Elder Land Wurm blocks, it loses defender.
flavor_text: Sometimes it's best to let sleeping dragons lie.

name: Elder Spawn
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you sacrifice an Island, sacrifice Elder Spawn and it deals 6 damage to you.
Elder Spawn can't be blocked by red creatures.

name: Elven Riders
oracle_text: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.
flavor_text: "Sometimes it is better to be swift of foot than strong of swordarm."—Eleven Proverb

name: Emerald Dragonfly
oracle_text: Flying
{G}{G}: Emerald Dragonfly gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Flittering, wheeling,/ darting in to strike, and then/ gone just as you blink."
—"Dragonfly Haiku," poet unkown

name: Enchanted Being
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Enchanted Being by enchanted creatures.

name: Enchantment Alteration
oracle_text: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

name: Energy Tap
oracle_text: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, add an amount of {C} equal to that creature's converted mana cost.

name: Equinox
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell if it would destroy a land you control."

name: Eternal Warrior
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has vigilance.
flavor_text: Warriors of the Tsunami-nito School spend years in training to master the way of effortless effort.

name: Eureka
oracle_text: Starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. Repeat this process until no one puts a card onto the battlefield.

name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
oracle_text: Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.
Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.
flavor_text: "The highway of fear is the shortest route to defeat."

name: Fallen Angel
oracle_text: Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

name: Falling Star
oracle_text: Flip Falling Star onto the playing area from a height of at least one foot. Falling Star deals 3 damage to each creature it lands on. Tap all creatures dealt damage by Falling Star. If Falling Star doesn't turn completely over at least once during the flip, it has no effect.

name: Feint
oracle_text: Tap all creatures blocking target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by that creature and each creature blocking it.

name: Field of Dreams
oracle_text: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
flavor_text: Some people say that the world is round, and if you travel far enough you'll come to the other side, where everything is upside down.

name: Fire Sprites
oracle_text: Flying
{G}, {T}: Add {R}.

name: Firestorm Phoenix
oracle_text: Flying
If Firestorm Phoenix would die, return it to its owner's hand instead. Until that player's next turn, that player plays with that card revealed in their hand and can't play it.
flavor_text: "The bird of wonder dies, the maiden phoenix,/ Her ashes new-create another heir/ As great in admiration as herself." —William Shakespeare, King Henry the Eighth.

name: Flash Counter
oracle_text: Counter target instant spell.
flavor_text: "She grinned at me—a wicked grin. ‘I hope you weren't relying too heavily on that, my dear.'" —Medryn Silverwand, Diary

name: Flash Flood
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target red permanent.
• Return target Mountain to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Many people say that no power can bring the mountains low. Many people are fools.

name: Floral Spuzzem
oracle_text: Whenever Floral Spuzzem attacks and isn't blocked, you may destroy target artifact defending player controls. If you do, Floral Spuzzem assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Force Spike
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

name: Forethought Amulet
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Forethought Amulet unless you pay {3}.
If an instant or sorcery source would deal 3 or more damage to you, it deals 2 damage to you instead.

name: Fortified Area
oracle_text: Wall creatures you control get +1/+0 and have banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Frost Giant
oracle_text: Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor_text: The Frost Giants have been out in the cold a long, long time, but they have their rage to keep them warm.

name: Gabriel Angelfire
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose flying, first strike, trample, or rampage 3. Gabriel Angelfire gains that ability until your next upkeep. (Whenever a creature with rampage 3 becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

name: Gaseous Form
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text: ". . . [A]nd gives to airy nothing/ A local habitation and a name." —William Shakespeare, A Midsummer-Night's Dream

name: Gauntlets of Chaos
oracle_text: {5}, Sacrifice Gauntlets of Chaos: Exchange control of target artifact, creature, or land you control and target permanent an opponent controls that shares one of those types with it. If those permanents are exchanged this way, destroy all Auras attached to them.

name: Ghosts of the Damned
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The voices of the dead ring in the heart long after they have faded from the ears.

name: Giant Slug
oracle_text: {5}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, choose a basic land type. Giant Slug gains landwalk of the chosen type until the end of that turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

name: Giant Strength
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"O! it is excellent/ To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous/ To use it like a giant." 
—William Shakespeare, Measure for Measure

name: Giant Turtle
oracle_text: Giant Turtle can't attack if it attacked during your last turn.
flavor_text: "The turtle lives 'twixt plated decks/ Which practically conceal its sex./ I think it clever of the turtle/ In such a fix to be so fertile." —Ogden Nash, "The Turtle"

name: Glyph of Delusion
oracle_text: Put X glyph counters on target creature that target Wall blocked this turn, where X is the power of that blocked creature. The creature gains "This creature doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a glyph counter on it" and "At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a glyph counter from this creature."

name: Glyph of Destruction
oracle_text: Target blocking Wall you control gets +10/+0 until end of combat. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Glyph of Doom
oracle_text: Choose target Wall creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that were blocked by that creature this turn.
flavor_text: "He knows he has a short span of life, that the day will come when he must pass through the wall of oblivion . . ." —William Faulkner

name: Glyph of Life
oracle_text: Choose target Wall creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage by an attacking creature this turn, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: Any wall can be battered down, but at what cost?

name: Glyph of Reincarnation
oracle_text: Cast this spell only after combat.

Destroy all creatures that were blocked by target Wall this turn. They can't be regenerated. For each creature that died this way, put a creature card from the graveyard of the player who controlled that creature the last time it became blocked by that Wall onto the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Gosta Dirk
oracle_text: First strike
Creatures with islandwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have islandwalk.

name: Gravity Sphere
oracle_text: All creatures lose flying.
flavor_text: On the morning of the Battle of Gal-Shan, the Sorcerer's cry rang out: "Let no bird fly, let no creature take wing, let all the battle join as one."

name: Great Defender
oracle_text: Target creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: Great Wall
oracle_text: Creatures with plainswalk can be blocked as though they didn't have plainswalk.

name: Greater Realm of Preservation
oracle_text: {1}{W}: The next time a black or red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Greed
oracle_text: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "There is no calamity greater than lavish desires./ There is no greater guilt than discontentment./ And there is no greater disaster than greed." —Tao Tê Ching 46

name: Green Mana Battery
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Green Mana Battery.
{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Green Mana Battery: Add {G}, then add an additional {G} for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Gwendlyn Di Corci
oracle_text: {T}: Target player discards a card at random. Activate this ability only during your turn.
flavor_text: Urborg became the final resting place of many swordsmen of renown, their steel outmatched by the wiles of Gwendlyn.

name: Halfdane
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, change Halfdane's base power and toughness to the power and toughness of target creature other than Halfdane until the end of your next upkeep.
flavor_text: Hail from Tolaria the ever changing 'Dane.

name: Hammerheim
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}.
{T}: Target creature loses all landwalk abilities until end of turn.
flavor_text: "‘Tis distance lends enchantment to the view,/ And robes the mountain in its azure hue." —Thomas Campbell, "Pleasures of Hope"

name: Hazezon Tamar
oracle_text: When Hazezon Tamar enters the battlefield, create X 1/1 Sand Warrior creature tokens that are red, green, and white at the beginning of your next upkeep, where X is the number of lands you control at that time.
When Hazezon leaves the battlefield, exile all Sand Warriors.

name: Headless Horseman
flavor_text: ". . . The ghost rides forth to the scene of battle in nightly quest of his head . . . he sometimes passes along the Hollow, like a midnight blast . . ." —Washington Irving, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow

name: Heaven's Gate
oracle_text: Any number of target creatures become white until end of turn.

name: Hell Swarm
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The brightness of day turned in an instant to dusk as the swarm descended upon the battlefield.

name: Hellfire
oracle_text: Destroy all nonblack creatures. Hellfire deals X plus 3 damage to you, where X is the number of creatures that died this way.
flavor_text: "High on a throne of royal state . . . insatiate to pursue vain war with heav'n." —John Milton, Paradise Lost

name: Hell's Caretaker
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
flavor_text: You might leave here, Chenndra, should another take your place . . . .

name: Holy Day
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: "The day of spirits; my soul's clam retreat/ Which none disturb!" —Henry Vaughan, "Silex Scintillans"

name: Horn of Deafening
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
flavor_text: "A blast, an echo . . . then silence."

name: Hornet Cobra
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: "Then inch by inch out of the grass rose up the head and spread hood of Nag, the big black cobra, and he was five feet long from tongue to tail." —Rudyard Kipling, The Jungle Books

name: Horror of Horrors
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Swamp: Regenerate target black creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text: "And a horror of outer darkness after,/And dust returneth to dust again." —Adam Lindsay Gordon, The Swimmer

name: Hunding Gjornersen
oracle_text: Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor_text: "You would never guess, at the terrifying sight of the man, that Hunding was as charming a companion as one could wish for."

name: Hyperion Blacksmith
oracle_text: {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "The smith a mighty man is he/ With large and sinewy hands./ And the muscles of his brawny arms/ Are strong as iron bands." —Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, The Village Blacksmith

name: Ichneumon Druid
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts an instant spell other than the first instant spell that player casts each turn, Ichneumon Druid deals 4 damage to that player.

name: Immolation
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.

name: Imprison
oracle_text: Enchant creature

Whenever a player activates an ability of enchanted creature with {T} in its activation cost that isn't a mana ability, you may pay {1}. If you do, counter that ability. If you don't, destroy Imprison.

Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you may pay {1}. If you do, tap the creature, remove it from combat, and creatures it was blocking that had become blocked by only that creature this combat become unblocked. If you don't, destroy Imprison.

name: In the Eye of Chaos
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts an instant spell, counter it unless that player pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: Indestructible Aura
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor_text: Theodar strode the battle lines, snatching swords with his bare hands and casting them aside until all cowered before him.

name: Infernal Medusa
oracle_text: Whenever Infernal Medusa blocks a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
Whenever Infernal Medusa becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

name: Infinite Authority
oracle_text: Enchant creature

Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with toughness 3 or less, destroy the other creature at end of combat. At the beginning of the next end step, if that creature was destroyed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on the first creature.

name: Invoke Prejudice
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell that doesn't share a color with a creature you control, counter that spell unless that player pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: Ivory Guardians
oracle_text: Protection from red
Creatures named Ivory Guardians get +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a nontoken red permanent.
flavor_text: The elite guard of the Mesa High Priests, the Ivory Guardians, were created to protect the innocent and faithful. Some say their actions are above the law.

name: Jacques le Vert
oracle_text: Green creatures you control get +0/+2.
flavor_text: Abandoning his sword to return to the lush forest of Pendelhaven, Jacques le Vert devoted his life to protecting the creatures of his homeland.

name: Jasmine Boreal
flavor_text: "Peace must prevail, even if the wicked must die."

name: Jedit Ojanen
flavor_text: Mightiest of the Cat Warriors, Jedit Ojanen forsook the forests of his tribe and took service with the Robaran Mercenaries, rising through their ranks to lead them in the battle for Efrava.

name: Jerrard of the Closed Fist
flavor_text: Once, the order of the Closed Fist reached throughout the Kb'Briann Highlands. Now, Jerrard alone remains to uphold their standard.

name: Johan
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Johan gain "Johan can't attack" until end of combat. If you do, attacking doesn't cause creatures you control to tap this combat if Johan is untapped.

name: Jovial Evil
oracle_text: Jovial Evil deals X damage to target opponent, where X is twice the number of white creatures that player controls.
flavor_text: "Today, for a lark, let's visit the plains. I'm sure we'll find something to entertain us."

name: Juxtapose
oracle_text: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.

name: Karakas
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
{T}: Return target legendary creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "To make a prairie it takes a clover and one bee,/ One clover, and a bee,/ And revery." —Emily Dickinson

name: Kasimir the Lone Wolf
flavor_text: Popular indeed is the tale of how Kasimir was once a Holy man who renounced his order to take up the sword. But this tale is no more likely than any other.

name: Keepers of the Faith
flavor_text: And then the Archangel Anthius spoke to them, saying, "Fear shall be vanquished by the Sword of Faith."

name: Kei Takahashi
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

name: Killer Bees
oracle_text: Flying
{G}: Killer Bees gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The communal mind produces a savage strategy, yet no one could predict that this vicious crossbreed would unravel the secret of steel.

name: Kismet
oracle_text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

name: Knowledge Vault
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library face down.
{0}: Sacrifice Knowledge Vault. If you do, discard your hand, then put all cards exiled with Knowledge Vault into their owner's hand.
When Knowledge Vault leaves the battlefield, put all cards exiled with Knowledge Vault into their owner's graveyard.

name: Kobold Drill Sergeant
oracle_text: Other Kobold creatures you control get +0/+1 and have trample.
flavor_text: "Joining this army is easy, boy. Just survive your first battle."

name: Kobold Overlord
oracle_text: First strike
Other Kobold creatures you control have first strike.
flavor_text:
"One for all, all for one; we strike first, and then you're done!" 
—Oath of the Kobold Musketeers

name: Kobold Taskmaster
oracle_text: Other Kobold creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor_text: The Taskmaster knows that there is no cure for the common Kobold.

name: Kobolds of Kher Keep
flavor_text: Kher Keep is unique among fortresses: impervious to aerial assault but defenseless from the ground.

name: Kry Shield
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by target creature you control. That creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: Lady Caleria
oracle_text: {T}: Lady Caleria deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Lady Evangela
oracle_text: {W}{B}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
flavor_text: "When milady was young, the sight of a rainbow would fill her soul with peace. As she grew, she learned to share her rapture with others." —Lady Gabriella

name: Lady Orca
flavor_text: "I do not remember what he said to her. I remember her fiery eyes, fixed upon him for an instant. I remember a flash, and the hot breath of sudden flames made me turn away. When I looked again, Angus was gone." —A Wayfarer, on meeting Lady Orca

name: Land Equilibrium
oracle_text: If an opponent who controls at least as many lands as you do would put a land onto the battlefield, that player instead puts that land onto the battlefield then sacrifices a land.

name: Land Tax
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Land's Edge
oracle_text: Discard a card: If the discarded card was a land card, Land's Edge deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. Any player may activate this ability.

name: Lesser Werewolf
oracle_text: {B}: If Lesser Werewolf's power is 1 or more, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn and put a -0/-1 counter on target creature blocking or blocked by Lesser Werewolf. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

name: Life Chisel
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Life Matrix
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Put a matrix counter on target creature and that creature gains "Remove a matrix counter from this creature: Regenerate this creature." Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Lifeblood
oracle_text: Whenever a Mountain an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Foolish wizard! As you tap the power of your lofty keep, so grows my strength." —Malvern Xelionos, Letters

name: Living Plane
oracle_text: All lands are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

name: Livonya Silone
oracle_text: First strike; legendary landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a legendary land.)
flavor_text: Livonya's own nature is a matter of mystery. Nothing is known for sure, merely rumors of unearthly stealth, and unholy alliances.

name: Lord Magnus
oracle_text: First strike
Creatures with plainswalk can be blocked as though they didn't have plainswalk.
Creatures with forestwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have forestwalk.

name: Lost Soul
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: She walks in the twilight, her steps make no sound,/ Her feet leave no tracks on the dew-covered ground./ Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name—/ But those who go with her are never the same.

name: Mana Drain
oracle_text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

name: Mana Matrix
oracle_text: Instant and enchantment spells you cast cost up to {2} less to cast.

name: Marble Priest
oracle_text: All Walls able to block Marble Priest do so.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Marble Priest by Walls.

name: Marhault Elsdragon
oracle_text: Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor_text: Marhault follows a strict philosophy, never letting emotions cloud his thoughts. No chance observer could imagine the rage in his heart.

name: Master of the Hunt
oracle_text: {2}{G}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Wolf creature token named Wolves of the Hunt. It has "bands with other creatures named Wolves of the Hunt." (Any creatures named Wolves of the Hunt can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other creatures named Wolves of the Hunt." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two creatures named Wolves of the Hunt you control, one of which has "bands with other creatures named Wolves of the Hunt," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Mirror Universe
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Mirror Universe: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Moat
oracle_text: Creatures without flying can't attack.
flavor_text: The purpose of any moat is to impede attack. Some are filled with water, some with thistles. Some are filled with things best left unseen.

name: Mold Demon
oracle_text: When Mold Demon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Swamps.

name: Moss Monster
flavor_text: After the battle, an eerie silence gripped the forest. The losers' remains were lightly dusted with green.

name: Mountain Stronghold
oracle_text: Red legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures." (Any legendary creatures can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other legendary creatures." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two legendary creatures you control, one of which has "bands with other legendary creatures," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Mountain Yeti
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
Protection from white
flavor_text: The Yeti's single greatest asset is its unnerving ability to blend in with its surroundings.

name: Nebuchadnezzar
oracle_text: {X}, {T}: Choose a card name. Target opponent reveals X cards at random from their hand. Then that player discards all cards with that name revealed this way. Activate this ability only during your turn.

name: Nether Void
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, counter it unless that player pays {3}.
flavor_text: These days, some wizards are finding that they have a little too much spell left at the end of their mana.

name: Nicol Bolas
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}.
Whenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.

name: North Star
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: For one spell this turn, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to pay that spell's mana cost. (Additional costs are still paid normally.)

name: Nova Pentacle
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature of an opponent's choice instead.

name: Osai Vultures
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on Osai Vultures.
Remove two carrion counters from Osai Vultures: Osai Vultures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A sign of battle, the Vultures circle and wait for the victorious to depart.

name: Palladia-Mors
oracle_text: Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Palladia-Mors unless you pay {R}{G}{W}.

name: Part Water
oracle_text: X target creatures gain islandwalk until end of turn. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: ". . . and the waters were a wall unto them on their right hand, and on their left." —Exodus, 14:22

name: Pavel Maliki
oracle_text: {B}{R}: Pavel Maliki gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: We all know the legend: Pavel wanders the realms, helping those in greatest need. But is this a measure of his generosity, or of his obligation to atone?

name: Pendelhaven
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "This is the forest primeval. The murmuring pines and the hemlocks . . . / Stand like Druids of old." —Henry WadsworthLongfellow, "Evangeline"

name: Petra Sphinx
oracle_text: {T}: Target player chooses a card name, then reveals the top card of their library. If that card has the chosen name, that player puts it into their hand. If it doesn't, the player puts it into their graveyard.
flavor_text: What walks on four legs in the morning, two legs in the afternoon, and three legs in the evening?

name: Pit Scorpion
oracle_text: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
flavor_text: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

name: Pixie Queen
oracle_text: Flying
{G}{G}{G}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Planar Gate
oracle_text: Creature spells you cast cost up to {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: Nireya reached through the Gate, sensing the energies trapped beyond.

name: Pradesh Gypsies
oracle_text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

name: Presence of the Master
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts an enchantment spell, counter it.

name: Primordial Ooze
oracle_text: Primordial Ooze attacks each combat if able.

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Primordial Ooze. Then you may pay {X}, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it. If you don't, tap Primordial Ooze and it deals X damage to you.
flavor_text: The thick, moving mass from the beginning of evolution swallows and digests the animate and inanimate as it unthinkingly strives to continue its existence.

name: Princess Lucrezia
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}.

name: Psionic Entity
oracle_text: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to itself.
flavor_text: Creatures of the Æther are notorious for neglecting their own well-being.

name: Psychic Purge
oracle_text: Psychic Purge deals 1 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Psychic Purge, that player loses 5 life.

name: Puppet Master
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand. If that card is returned to its owner's hand this way, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, return Puppet Master to its owner's hand.

name: Pyrotechnics
oracle_text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text: "Hi! ni! ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me! Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return."—Navajo war chant

name: Quagmire
oracle_text: Creatures with swampwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have swampwalk.

name: Quarum Trench Gnomes
oracle_text: {T}: If target Plains is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of white mana. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor_text: "O Great Captain, all is lost. They tunneled, they burrowed, they trenched. They sapped the strength of our defenses." —Sorgus, Chronicles of the Quarum Plains

name: Rabid Wombat
oracle_text: Vigilance
Rabid Wombat gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.

name: Radjan Spirit
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

name: Raging Bull
flavor_text: "Sometimes the bulls win, and sometimes the bears win. But the bulls have more fun." —Anonymous

name: Ragnar
oracle_text: {G}{W}{U}, {T}: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text: "On the field of honor, a soldier need have no fear."

name: Ramirez DePietro
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: Ramirez DePietro is a most flamboyant pirate. Be careful not to believe his tall tales, especially when you ask his age.

name: Ramses Overdark
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target enchanted creature.

name: Rapid Fire
oracle_text: Cast this spell only before blockers are declared.

Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. If it doesn't have rampage, that creature gains rampage 2 until end of turn. (Whenever the creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

name: Rasputin Dreamweaver
oracle_text: Rasputin Dreamweaver enters the battlefield with seven dream counters on it.
Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Add {C}.
Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Rasputin this turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Rasputin started the turn untapped, put a dream counter on it.
Rasputin can't have more than seven dream counters on it.

name: Rebirth
oracle_text: Remove Rebirth from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante.
Each player may ante the top card of their library. If a player does, that player's life total becomes 20.

name: Recall
oracle_text: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Exile Recall.

name: Red Mana Battery
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Red Mana Battery.
{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Red Mana Battery: Add {R}, then add an additional {R} for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Reincarnation
oracle_text: Choose target creature. When that creature dies this turn, return a creature card from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield under the control of that creature's owner.

name: Relic Barrier
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target artifact.

name: Relic Bind
oracle_text: Enchant artifact an opponent controls
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, choose one —
• Relic Bind deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Target player gains 1 life.

name: Remove Enchantments
oracle_text: Return to your hand all enchantments you both own and control, all Auras you own attached to permanents you control, and all Auras you own attached to attacking creatures your opponents control. Then destroy all other enchantments you control, all other Auras attached to permanents you control, and all other Auras attached to attacking creatures your opponents control.

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then fell lifeless to the ground.

name: Reset
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during an opponent's turn after their upkeep step.
Untap all lands you control.

name: Revelation
oracle_text: Players play with their hands revealed.
flavor_text: "Many are in high place, and of renown: but mysteries are revealed unto the meek." —Ecclesiastes 3:19

name: Reverberation
oracle_text: All damage that would be dealt this turn by target sorcery spell is dealt to that spell's controller instead.

name: Righteous Avengers
oracle_text: Plainswalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)
flavor_text: Few can withstand the wrath of the righteous.

name: Ring of Immortals
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.

name: Riven Turnbull
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}.
flavor_text: "Political violence is a perfectly legitimate answer to the persecution handed down by dignitaries of the state."

name: Rohgahh of Kher Keep
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {R}{R}{R}. If you don't, tap Rohgahh of Kher Keep and all creatures named Kobolds of Kher Keep, then an opponent gains control of them.
Creatures you control named Kobolds of Kher Keep get +2/+2.

name: Rubinia Soulsinger
oracle_text: You may choose not to untap Rubinia Soulsinger during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Rubinia and Rubinia remains tapped.

name: Rust
oracle_text: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
flavor_text:
"How dull it is to pause, to make an end,/ To rust unburnished, not to shine in use,/ As though to breathe were life!" 
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "Ulysses"

name: Sea Kings' Blessing
oracle_text: Any number of target creatures become blue until end of turn.

name: Seafarer's Quay
oracle_text: Blue legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures." (Any legendary creatures can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other legendary creatures." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two legendary creatures you control, one of which has "bands with other legendary creatures," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Seeker
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.

name: Segovian Leviathan
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: "Leviathan, too! Can you catch him with a fish-hook/ or run a line round his tongue?" —Job 40:25

name: Sentinel
oracle_text: {0}: Change Sentinel's base toughness to 1 plus the power of target creature blocking or blocked by Sentinel. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Serpent Generator
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Snake artifact creature token. It has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter." (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Shelkin Brownie
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature loses all "bands with other" abilities until end of turn.
flavor_text: Leave a bowl of milk on your doorstep each night for the brownies, or they'll cause you no end of mischief.

name: Shield Wall
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

name: Shimian Night Stalker
oracle_text: {B}, {T}: All damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target attacking creature is dealt to Shimian Night Stalker instead.
flavor_text: "‘Tis now the very witching time of night,/ When churchyards yawn and hell itself breathes out/ Contagion to this world." —William Shakespeare, Hamlet

name: Silhouette
oracle_text: Choose target creature. If a spell or ability that targets that creature would cause a source to deal damage to that creature this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Sir Shandlar of Eberyn
flavor_text: "Remember Sir Shandlar! Remember and stand firm!" —rallying cry of the Eberyn militia

name: Sivitri Scarzam
flavor_text: Even the brave have cause to tremble at the sight of Sivitri Scarzam. Who else has tamed Scarzam's Dragon?

name: Sol'kanar the Swamp King
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Whenever a player casts a black spell, you gain 1 life.

name: Spectral Cloak
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shroud as long as it's untapped. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

name: Spinal Villain
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target blue creature.
flavor_text: "Striking silent as a dream,/ Cutting short the strangled scream . . ." —Tobrian, "Watchdragon"

name: Spirit Link
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

name: Spirit Shackle
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

name: Spiritual Sanctuary
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls a Plains, they gain 1 life.

name: Stangg
oracle_text: When Stangg enters the battlefield, create a legendary 3/4 red and green Human Warrior creature token named Stangg Twin. Exile that token when Stangg leaves the battlefield. Sacrifice Stangg when that token leaves the battlefield.

name: Storm Seeker
oracle_text: Storm Seeker deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

name: Storm World
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Storm World deals X damage to that player, where X is 4 minus the number of cards in their hand.

name: Subdue
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn. That creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: Sunastian Falconer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text: Sunastian has roots in both sorcery and swordplay; he has learned never to depend too heavily on the latter.

name: Sword of the Ages
oracle_text: Sword of the Ages enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}, Sacrifice Sword of the Ages and any number of creatures you control: Sword of the Ages deals X damage to any target, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way, then exile Sword of the Ages and those creature cards.

name: Sylvan Library
oracle_text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

name: Sylvan Paradise
oracle_text: Any number of target creatures become green until end of turn.

name: Syphon Soul
oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: "Her lips suck forth; see, where it flies!"—Christopher Marlowe, The Tragical History of Doctor Faustus

name: Takklemaggot
oracle_text: Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.

When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller chooses a creature that Takklemaggot could enchant. If the player does, return Takklemaggot to the battlefield under your control attached to that creature. If they don't, return Takklemaggot to the battlefield under your control as a non-Aura enchantment. It loses "enchant creature" and gains "At the beginning of that player's upkeep, Takklemaggot deals 1 damage to that player."

name: Telekinesis
oracle_text: Tap target creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn. It doesn't untap during its controller's next two untap steps.

name: Teleport
oracle_text: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step.
Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

name: Tempest Efreet
oracle_text: Remove Tempest Efreet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante.

{T}, Sacrifice Tempest Efreet: Target opponent may pay 10 life. If that player doesn't, they reveal a card at random from their hand. Exchange ownership of the revealed card and Tempest Efreet. Put the revealed card into your hand and Tempest Efreet from anywhere into that player's graveyard. This change in ownership is permanent.

name: Tetsuo Umezawa
oracle_text: Tetsuo Umezawa can't be the target of Aura spells.
{U}{B}{B}{R}, {T}: Destroy target tapped or blocking creature.

name: The Abyss
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: "An immense river of oblivion is sweeping us away into a nameless abyss." —Ernest Renan, Souvenirs d'Enfance et de Jeunesse

name: The Brute
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text: "Union may be strength, but it is mere blind brute strength unless wisely directed." —Samuel Butler

name: The Lady of the Mountain
flavor_text: Her given name has been lost in the mists of time. Legend says that her silent vigil will one day be ended by the one who, pure of heart and spirit, calls out that name again.

name: The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale
oracle_text: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature unless you pay {1}."

name: The Wretched
oracle_text: At end of combat, gain control of all creatures blocking The Wretched for as long as you control The Wretched.

name: Thunder Spirit
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
flavor_text: "It was full of fire and smoke and light and . . . it drove between us and the Efrafans like a thousand thunderstorms with lightning." —Richard Adams, Watership Down

name: Time Elemental
oracle_text: When Time Elemental attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.

name: Tobias Andrion
flavor_text: Administrator of the military state of Sheoltun, Tobias is the military right arm of the empire and the figurehead of its freedom.

name: Tolaria
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}.
{T}: Target creature loses banding and all "bands with other" abilities until end of turn. Activate this ability only during any upkeep step.
flavor_text: "Fairest Isle, all isles excelling,/ Seat of pleasures, and of loves . . ." —John Dryden

name: Tor Wauki
oracle_text: {T}: Tor Wauki deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Torsten Von Ursus
flavor_text: "How can you accuse me of evil? Though these deeds be unsavory, no one will argue: good shall follow from them."

name: Touch of Darkness
oracle_text: Any number of target creatures become black until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Black spirits and white, red spirits and gray,/ Mingle, mingle, mingle, you that mingle may." —Thomas Middleton, The Witch

name: Transmutation
oracle_text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You know what I was,/ You see what I am: change me, change me!"—Randall

name: Triassic Egg
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Put a hatchling counter on Triassic Egg.
Sacrifice Triassic Egg: Choose one —
• You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only if two or more hatchling counters are on Triassic Egg.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only if two or more hatchling counters are on Triassic Egg.

name: Tuknir Deathlock
oracle_text: Flying
{R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: An explorer of the Æther, Tuknir often discovers himself in the most unusual physical realms.

name: Tundra Wolves
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains.

name: Typhoon
oracle_text: Typhoon deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of Islands that player controls.
flavor_text: Fierce winds ripped across the tropical landscape. What they did not destroy with their fiery breath was washed away by torrential rain.

name: Undertow
oracle_text: Creatures with islandwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have islandwalk.

name: Underworld Dreams
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to that player.
flavor_text: "In the drowsy dark cave of the mind dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan." —Rabindranath Tagore

name: Unholy Citadel
oracle_text: Black legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures." (Any legendary creatures can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other legendary creatures." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two legendary creatures you control, one of which has "bands with other legendary creatures," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Untamed Wilds
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Urborg
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}.
{T}: Target creature loses first strike or swampwalk until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Resignedly beneath the sky/The melancholy waters lie./So blend the turrets and shadows there/That all seem pendulous in air,/While from a proud tower in town/Death looks gigantically down." —Edgar Allan Poe, "The City in the Sea"

name: Ur-Drago
oracle_text: First strike
Creatures with swampwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have swampwalk.

name: Vaevictis Asmadi
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vaevictis Asmadi unless you pay {B}{R}{G}.
{B}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{R}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{G}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Vampire Bats
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
flavor_text: "For something is amiss or out of place/ When mice with wings can wear a human face." —Theodore Roethke, "The Bat"

name: Venarian Gold
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Venarian Gold enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and put a number of sleep counters on it equal to the value of X as you cast Venarian Gold.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step if it has a sleep counter on it.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, remove a sleep counter from that creature.

name: Visions
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. You may then have that player shuffle that library.
flavor_text: "Visions of glory, spare my aching sight,/ Ye unborn ages, crowd not on my soul!"—Thomas Gray, The Bard

name: Voodoo Doll
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a pin counter on Voodoo Doll.
At the beginning of your end step, if Voodoo Doll is untapped, destroy Voodoo Doll and it deals damage to you equal to the number of pin counters on it.
{X}{X}, {T}: Voodoo Doll deals damage equal to the number of pin counters on it to any target. X is the number of pin counters on Voodoo Doll.

name: Walking Dead
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Walking Dead.
flavor_text: The Walking Dead are the remains of freakish experiments by the Necromantic Lords.

name: Wall of Caltrops
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

Whenever Wall of Caltrops blocks a creature, if at least one other Wall creature is blocking that creature and no non-Wall creatures are blocking that creature, Wall of Caltrops gains banding until end of turn. (If any creatures with banding you control are blocking a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by.)
flavor_text: "Ow! Ow ow ow! Oooh, ow, OW!"

name: Wall of Dust
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Dust blocks a creature, that creature can't attack during its controller's next turn.
flavor_text: An ever-moving swarm of dust engulfs and disorients anything that comes near.

name: Wall of Earth
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: The ground shuddered violently and the earth seemed to come to life. The elemental force contained in the vast wall of earth was trapped, bent to its controller's will.

name: Wall of Heat
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: At a distance, we mistook the sound for a waterfall . . .

name: Wall of Light
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Protection from black
flavor_text: As many attackers were dazzled by the wall's beauty as were halted by its force.

name: Wall of Opposition
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{1}: Wall of Opposition gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Like so many obstacles in life, the Wall of Opposition is but an illusion, held fast by the focus and belief of the one who creates it.

name: Wall of Putrid Flesh
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Protection from white
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Putrid Flesh by enchanted creatures.

name: Wall of Shadows
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Shadows by creatures it's blocking.
Wall of Shadows can't be the target of spells that can target only Walls or of abilities that can target only Walls.

name: Wall of Tombstones
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, change Wall of Tombstones's base toughness to 1 plus the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Wall of Vapor
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Vapor by creatures it's blocking.
flavor_text: "Walls of a castle are made out of stone,/ Walls of a house out of bricks or of wood./ My walls are made out of magic alone,/ Stronger than any that ever have stood." —Chrysoberyl Earthsdaughter, Incantations

name: Wall of Wonder
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}{U}{U}: Wall of Wonder gets +4/-4 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: So confusing is the Wall's appearance that few of its victims even see it move.

name: Whirling Dervish
oracle_text: Protection from black
At the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: White Mana Battery
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on White Mana Battery.
{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from White Mana Battery: Add {W}, then add an additional {W} for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Willow Satyr
oracle_text: You may choose not to untap Willow Satyr during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target legendary creature for as long as you control Willow Satyr and Willow Satyr remains tapped.

name: Winds of Change
oracle_text: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.
flavor_text: "‘Tis the set of sails, and not the gales,/ Which tells us the way to go." —Ella Wheeler Wilcox

name: Winter Blast
oracle_text: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.
flavor_text: "Blow, winds, and crack your cheeks! rage! blow!" —William Shakespeare, King Lear

name: Wolverine Pack
oracle_text: Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor_text: "Give them great meals of beef and iron and steel, they will eat like wolves and fight like devils." —William Shakespeare, King Henry V

name: Wood Elemental
oracle_text: As Wood Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of untapped Forests.
Wood Elemental's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests sacrificed as it entered the battlefield.

name: Xira Arien
oracle_text: Flying
{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Target player draws a card.
flavor_text: A regular guest at the Royal Masquerade, Arien is the envy of the Court. She appears in a new costume every hour.

name: Zephyr Falcon
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.
